sqlite
insert into t_user (username, `password`, nickname, mail, addr, age, sex, mobile, login_time, last_login_time, login_count, create_time, organization_id ) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update t_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_count = #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select 'true' as QUERYID,id, username, `password`, nickname, mail, addr, age, sex, mobile, login_time, last_login_time, login_count, create_time, organization_id from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, username, `password`, nickname, mail, addr, age, sex, mobile, login_time, last_login_time, login_count, create_time, organization_id from t_user
